Articles.Content:
Hi there; well i thought i would show off a vehicle i did not make, but im testing.

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/UDL4_Poster2_zps551d9cc1.png' alt='UDL4_Poster2_zps551d9cc1.png'>

Probably been done before, but i like it.

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM/KSCSM 8thBMTS Sulaco.

The Dropship was made by Devo, He has also made different ships and has the Sulaco as a WIP. Also, you cant put the missiles on/in the fold out wings, unless you modified them to be infernal robotics joints.
That would be awesome to see Sulaco! Never thought about the missiles working, hmmm.....
Every time someone posts a post about a awesome craft and doesn't provide a file, Harvester kills a Kerbal.
